narrative.inOrderTo: assert that the dashboard functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/ is working
narrative.iWantTo: run the daily regressions at least twice a day

scenario.title: Logging into the dashboard
scenario.step: Given the user is on the dashboard page
When the user logs into the dashboard
Then they should see the the summary page

scenario.title: Update insurance application information
scenario.step: Given the user is on the dashboard homepage
When the user reviews the application
Then the user should update insurance information
